item.title: September is National Preparedness Month-- A Reminder to Check your Supplies for the winter storm season…
item.description: President Obama has proclaimed September as National Preparedness Month.

item.title: Study reveals melt welts dynamics inside larger earthquakes
item.description: U.S. seismologists at CA’s Scripps Institution of Oceanography have released a study indicating fault zones weaken in select locations shortly after a fault reaches an earthquake tipping point. This can then transform a smaller series of quakes into a large mega-quake.
